article_title: Failure To File Tax Returns May Result In Loss Of Affordable Health Care

article_metadata.description: The IRS is reminding taxpayers that the new health care law requires that some households file tax returns in order to receive their subsidies next year - even if those households aren’t otherwise required to file a tax return because of their income.
article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: The IRS is reminding taxpayers that the new health care law requires that some households file tax returns in order to receive their subsidies next year - even if those households aren’t otherwise required to file a tax return because of their income.
